articles.title: Statement from Chairman of the Board of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac William J. Pulte on Reports that Jerome Powell Is Considering Resigning - FHFA (.gov)
articles.description: Washington, D.C. – “I’m encouraged by reports that Jerome Powell is considering resigning. I think this will be the right decision for America, and the economy will boom.”
articles.content:

articles.author: John Hudson, Hannah Natanson
articles.title: State Department is firing more than 1,300 employees in downsizing plan - The Washington Post
articles.description: The move has drawn criticism from current and former diplomats who say the cuts will degrade America’s standing in the world and curb U.S. soft power.
articles.content: The State Department began firing more than 1,300 employees via email on Friday as a part of the Trump administrations plans to downsize government and cut back on alleged bloat and inefficiencies. T… [+7830 chars]

articles.title: CDC finds nearly 1 in 3 US youth have prediabetes, but experts question scant data - AP News
articles.description: A new federal estimate shows that nearly 1 in 3 U.S. adolescents had prediabetes in 2023, far higher than a previous estimate of 1 in 5. The finding is spurring concerns about the health of America's children and also the way Trump administration officials ar…
